column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The shot glasses
column2: along with all of our bar glasses
column3: are placed in the light-green plastic dishwasher racks and run through the bar dishwasher on a 60-second cycle. But just as you mentioned with the extended wait times
column4: we serve several hundred guests per hour
column5: so we tend to get rushed during peak business hours
column6: and while our dishwasher isn't a perfect machine
column7: it is an industry-standard model you will find in just about every restaurant in town
